title: Crashing
body: It has happened three times twice in ranked and once in norms all in a row. Where when I load all the way into the game and it will show me spawning  into the game and then it freezes and I have to restart my computer. Any ideas on how to fix it???

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, it's likely that the Anniversary updates that enabled some new functionality in the Xbox app may be causing this issue. To test this, you can [disable the Game Bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this worked!
